name: Shark Huntin'
description:
You're a dog paddling into the shore on a leisurely  morning swim.

Your only goal is to aim for the waves to catch them and speed yourself up.

Nothing could be simpler or more relaxing... right?

Hey! Welcome to my first ever Itch project.

I'm super excited to have finished a full project and to be able to upload it now.

This project was submitted for the 41st Godot Wild Jam, and I learnt a lot through participating. I realised how quickly time can disappears when working on a game. Nonetheless I'm very pleased to have finished a project and gotten my first one under my belt.

I do hope you can try it out and enjoy it, and please, do leave some feedback.

Thanks so much!
